'''Christopher Reilly''', also called '''Chris Reilly,''' is an actor based in London, born in Glasgow.

In ''[[Game of Thrones]]'' he has played two roles. The first was [[Tom|Soldier Tom]], a [[House Stark|Stark]] soldier in the [[Season 2|second season]]. He later played [[Morgan]], a [[House Lannister|Lannister]] soldier in the [[Season 4|fourth season]].
